reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, not itchy at all, and appreciate its perfect length for leggings. Customers praise its quality, warmth during cold months, and color options, with one mentioning it pairs well with brown accessories.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect all the way around!
items.body: This is a fantastic Sweater, long comfy, and the neck is a bit taller which is nice. I am a cowlneck lover, this one gets really close unlike some that are often too short. It is so very soft, and made really well. You will love it, I recommend this sweater for anyone who loves light weight but heavy enough for warmth. No pockets are included with this one. The pilling is really nice. It is true to size. Overall, I love it! Read more
items.author: Jammie Freeman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is not the sweater to size up on
items.body: Super comfortable the fabric is so soft. It is very thick sweater material and nice and warm. I would not advise sizing up. It is already oversized so by your size don’t size up it’s really long could almost be a sweater dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: This sweater is very flattering. It runs true to size. It is an oversized look. Not quite as soft as I would like but soft enough. I am very sensitive to yarns and this one passes the test. I also don’t like knits that come up around my neck. This one barely comes up over the neck and it can be folded down. It does not bother me. I got it in four different colors and will wear them with leggings and jeans all winter. Would look cute with skirts and boots also. Read more
items.author: Hanne G

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft n comfy
items.body: I like the sweater. It’s soft, warm, comfy. Four stars because, as noted by another buyer, the picture features a bulky knit look but that isn’t accurate. Also, no tumble dry which makes it inconvenient after a wash to hang dry in colder winter climates. That takes forever. Reviews were mixed re: size. I wanted the really oversized look (like the model), but if I’d followed the reviews for my size, I wouldn’t have gotten that. So, to (hopefully) help future buyers, I’m 5’2” and 125 lbs. I got the large and I’m very glad that I did. Got the oversized look I wanted and it reaches mid-thigh to just above the knee-like a tunic. And the large offers a bit larger mock turtleneck so it doesn’t rub my neck or chin. Otherwise, it’s well made and stylish and I’d recommend it. Just take care to get the look/size you want and note the washing instructions. Read more
items.author: HomeTree

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s HUGE!
items.body: It’s HUGE! I haven’t tried wearing it yet. I may have to send it back. Read more
items.author: Moxie Q.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite sweater
items.body: My favorite sweater! So soft and comfy! Oversized fit. Perfect for leggings or jeans. You can also dress up for work! Thicker sweater but not heavy or bulky. I bought a large in slate blue color. Love the color. I want in more colors. Read more
items.author: carrie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cozy
items.body: This sweater is super warm, comfortable, beautiful, and perfectly oversized. It fits so well — I even have it in three colors. Read more
items.author: Nadiya Adzhavenko

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: I want another one....this is my favorite sweater ...so soft... excellent quality...perfect length for leggings and I got the brown which is beautiful....just the right thickness and it is warm and true to size Read more
items.author: Regena Bliss

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Beige White, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Bright Lake Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
